name: HKActivityRingView
desc: A view that uses the Move, Exercise, and Stand activity rings to display data from a HealthKit activity summary object.

items.name: var activitySummary: HKActivitySummary?
items.desc: The active summary displayed by the activity ring view.

items.name: func setActivitySummary(HKActivitySummary?, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Sets the activity summary displayed by the activity ring view.
